Uses of Interface
provided.rmiUtils.IRMIUtils

  • Packages that use IRMIUtils 
    Package Description
    provided.discovery
    A package with all the interface definitions and capabilities to manage discovery servers and associated end points.
    provided.discovery.impl.model
    Optional convenience classes and interfaces for use in the "model" side of a system.
    provided.rmiUtils
    Utilities for managing RMI plus the declarations of shared RMI-related constants.

    • Uses of IRMIUtils in provided.discovery

      Methods in provided.discovery with parameters of type IRMIUtils 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static IDiscoveryManager IDiscoveryConnection.getDiscoveryManager​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils)
      Get a discovery manager from the default IP address The supplied IRMIUtils instance MUST be ALREADY STARTED!
      static IDiscoveryManager IDiscoveryConnection.getDiscoveryManagerAt​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils, java.lang.String ipAddr)
      Get a discovery manager from a specific IP address.
      void IDiscoveryManager.start​(IRMIUtils rmiUtils)
      Starts the discovery manager on the current machine.

    • Uses of IRMIUtils in provided.rmiUtils

      Classes in provided.rmiUtils that implement IRMIUtils 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  RMIUtils
      Concrete implementaion of the IRMIUtils, which are utilities to make it easier to start/stop the RMI system, access local/remote Registries and get the local IP address.
